attributes.action: Answer a question honestly and NOT avoid it with another history lesson

attributes.background: Mr. Brown likes to remind us of things from the past, but enough of the broken record...Answer the question you're asked, we don't want a history lesson!  The people of Britain are sick of you avoiding questions!
